comment: She offers a lot of extra credit when you show up to class so you should make an A. Took this as an hybrid, so all our work is done online. The modules can be tedious sometimes but it's nothing hard.

Mrs. Wolfe is really funny and you can tell she loves her job. Offers lots of extra credit if you show up to class. Lots of random online assignments that are pretty stupid, but easy. would recommend her as a professor.

I took this class as a hybrid so skipping class wasn't a huge deal but that's where you got most of your extra credit points from. This class is super easy and she's the best person to take wellness with.

I took Professor Wolfe's WELL 1000 hybrid class and it was the best decision to get this class done as a gen ed requirement. There aren't any tests or quizzes in this class either which is AMAZING. This class was actually very enjoyable. She doesn't waste your time and she just wants you to have fun and learn how to have a healthy lifestyle. 10/10
Easy A and super sweet professor. No tests, just blogs and class participation. Had to dress out 3 times for a 30 minute workout of your choice.

This teacher is awesome! Easy A class that doesn't take much effort. You have to buy an online book that you use about every two weeks, but other than that attendance isn't required and she sometimes gives extra credit! Also, there are a few workout labs here and there but she isn't very serious about them. I would definitely take her again!
Almost everything is online. I have finished an assignment the night it was due online. I would take this class again. I wish all classes were this nice to take.
She's so laid-back and such a breath of fresh air. I barely had to put any effort in at all. There are no tests at all, just assignments you could honestly start an hour before they're due.

She is a wonderful instructor. She makes sure you submit everything on time and that you get the subject before doing so.  Sometimes when she is overwhelmed with her own assignment due dates she extends the time on when you can submit it. THERE ARE NO TESTS! Just a lot of writing about your health. Easiest class ever!

She almost always lets class out early and never talks for long. Easy grader and funny. She does not believe in tests so there are only online assignments that I am pretty sure she just skims and gives you a 100.
Really nice lady, made it easy on us. Worked on a point scale so I was done with the class a few weeks early which was great. Attractive and super personable and always willing to help out.

She's an awesome, easy going person. She's got a kind heart and is very accessible.  The class is incredibly easy, as a required HPS class should be. Just don't be stupid, show up to class, do all of your homework, have an extra computer near you for your test and it will be the easiest A you ever got.

Dr. Wolfe is the best. No one should have to struggle in HPS for an A. The tests are all online, including the final. You can use your book but if you have the online book be sure to have it open on a different computer. I went to class, missed a few, and still had an A without even taking the 3rd test, final exam, or final lab.

TAKE HER!!!! She is the sweetest, caring, and funniest professor I have had. You do some labs from the book and some in class assignments. There are a couple tests but they are online and easy. You also can exempt the final if you have an A.

The easiest A you can make BUT be aware you will hear quite a few wrong statements about the sciences. If you can't overlook that for the sake of an easy A, then this class is not for you. Complex functions of chem, bio and anatomy are boiled down into soundbites, and inevitably oversimplified to the point of being factually incorrect.

The material is inherently a bit dull, but it's health after all so that's to be expected. Considering that, she really goes out of her way to keep the class interesting and you can honestly tell she's a GREAT person who enjoys to teach. Loves to make the class laugh and is full of personality! Take her for sure!
Mrs. Wolfe is extremely nice and helpful. Super easy class if you do assignments. Can exempt final and drop lowest test grade. Take her.
Easiest teacher ever, You would be a fool not to take her.

Great professor! Take her if you lucky to have her class....I learn so much about health...she is really a good person and she teaches so well. Just be responsible and do your work on time and at the end it will be easy on you...she is really a good one...

you would be crazy not to take her. easiest tests ever. final is optional. you have to give barely any effort for this class. Easy HIGH A. this class is a joke. I love her, she is awesome and is so flexible!

AMAZING TEACHER. She's so sweet and super easy on grading. The only big physical activity we had was walking/running the mile. She ended class early a lot, gives plenty of extra credit and is a hilarious teacher. Her classes are never boring, she keeps it alive. As long as you do her labs and do practice tests online, you will easily receive an A.
She's a very nice professor. She'll help you out any way she can. Attend class, take notes, and you'll get an A.
Such a good professor.
Easy class. Great Professor, if you do the work (which isnt hard) you will pass. Gives Bonus. Very Understanding, and very funny.

Exams and many assignments. Definitely need the textbook. For the exams, do the pre and post tests on the web site over and over and you will make a 100% on every exam. If you're an organized person, you will LOVE this class. EXTREMELY easy and Prof. Wolfe is so sweet and awesome. I made a 98% in this class by just being on top of my assignments.

Take her. She was easy. You have to sign in, she gives lots of extra credit, and the tests come off the website practice tests. As long as you go to class and do the Labs you can easily make an A. Use the Online guides that give you, she is so sweet and really is upbeat about what she teaches. Take her, can't go wrong.

She didn't know any of the information she was teaching. I do NOT recommend her, but if youre stuck w/ her- borrow the $90 book code from your neighbor in class and do the practice tests online about 15-20 times and you'll ace every test.. Make up answers for all her other busy work.. I literally signed off on my own work that needed signatures.

Great professor! Really really nice and very helpful. I got into a traffic accident and told her I was gonna miss a lot of class and she was extremly helpful. I know I had a B in the class but she gave me an A. One of the best classes i've had.
Shes really cool. THe class is a joke its so easy take this class its super easy and fun shes a great teacher.
this class is really easy there is a good amount of extra credit to put it simply i received a C on all the tests and got a 100 in the class just show up and you will do fine
The class is okay. Can get boring but you dress out for little physical activities. Gives tons of extra credit and the test are mulitple choice. You can def take it a and pass.

I loved her class. First half of the class was bookwork and lecture, second half was fun stuff. Very easy to make an A and there are a lot of opportunities to get extra credit if you get lazy. She's really sweet, and very helpful.

Best teacher hands down, well prepared for class, makes it fun and interesting, you'll learn alot. Class notes and study guides online are a big help for tests. She obviously loves what she does and cares about her students!

Her class is so much fun and she has a lot of activites and little stuff for extra credit. I could have done better than a B but we were supposed to work out at the school gym for 6 hours total = 100 pts but i didnt do that. Many people had more than 500 points at the end which was the maximum. Take textbook if she tells you to. Quizzes are random!
